name: FAKEAD
description:
Tired of these fake ads that show on your mobile device that are the complete opposite of the real game? Then FAKEAD it's made for you!!. 

Fakead is a strategy game in which you have to decide between two panels and have a higher number than the enemy.... most of the times. One will be a bad decision and the other one not, well, maybe.

  • 30 amazing levels + Extra level
  • 1 special enemy
  • The zombies can dance!!
  • The game save itself

With Fakead you can now say that the ad was not fake.

*Please do not post fake ads about fakead, it will disrupt the fabric of reality*
